name: DashOrDie
description:
A skilled thief sneaks into a high-security building undetected and is able to steal some very valuable diamonds. Unfortunately for the thief, as soon as the diamonds are stolen the security system activates, forcing them to navigate through several rooms whilst avoiding various hazards.

Made as one of the CSULB VGDA Spring 2019 Semester Project Entries.

Songs Used:

http://ccmixter.org/files/Bluemillenium/57202

http://ccmixter.org/files/jlbrock44/56346

Game created by: Weston Elliott

*Note: If you have sticky keys enabled on your computer, consider disabling it when you play this.*
